Role in Configuration Functional Compone: System of record for Actual Product Instances
Relationships: Linked to Virtual Machine (1:n); Linked to Storage Plan (n:1)
Notes: Stores core attributes (Id, Name, Type, Status, IP) and lifecycle data

Relationships: Tagged with Resource Tag (n:m); Emits to Log Server (n:1)
Notes: Supports dependency graphs and change correlation

Relationships: Monitored by Prometheus Alert Rule Cluster (1:n)
Notes: Used for incident/event prioritization
Realization endpoint for deployments from Desired Product Instance
Holds key attributes required by 9.2.1.1

Relationships: Hosted on Server (n:1); Uses Storage Plan (n:1)
Notes: Represents realized compute node (workload)

Relationships: Linked to Incident (n:m); Linked to Webhook Event (n:m)
Notes: For business impact of Incident/Event

Relationships: Monitored by Prometheus Alert Rule Cluster (1:n)
Notes: Operational telemetry linkage
Participates in dependency mapping and blast-radius analysis

Relationships: Linked to Server (1:n); Linked to Virtual Machine (1:n)
Notes: Defines storage class/tiers and capacity
Concrete storage CI used in configuration model

Relationships: Mapped to Server (n:m); Used by Site User (n:m)
Notes: Represents DNS/domain bindings in production

Relationships: Domain depends on Server; Server provides service to Domain
Notes: Captures inter-instance dependencies

Relationships: Depends on Server/VM (n:m); Uses Press Settings (n:1)
Notes: Represents the running app/service realization

Relationships: Linked to Incident (n:m); Linked to Webhook Event (n:m)
Notes: Trace business impact at service level

Role in Configuration Functional Compone: Configuration data for Actual Product Instance
Notes: Holds deploy-time/runtime parameters (part of CI model)
Enables queryable blast-radius/impact views
Used to correlate changes, incidents, and events

Relationships: Has Deploy Candidate (1:n); Targets Release Group Server (1:n)
Notes: Bridges Desired Product Instance to deployment targets

Relationships: Targets Server (n:m); Belongs to Release Group (n:1)
Notes: Specifies which servers receive a release

Relationships: Belongs to Release Group (n:1); Deployed to Server/VM (n:m)
Notes: Represents a version/build to be realized in production
Supports prioritization by affected instances and contracts
Feeds data to impact analysis
Used to evaluate event impact on services
Assists in RCA and prioritization
Provides health signals and thresholds
Populates/refreshes CMDB entries automatically
Defines task units for discovery/collection
Defines discovery methods/protocols
Represents access/ownership context
Supports restore tests and lifecycle checkpoints
Provides step-by-step remediation; required by 9.2.1.1 relationship
Supports measurement and prioritization by contract
Distinct from Incident per ITIL; supports trend and RCA
Must include Id, Name, Type, CI model, Create/Modified, Location
